Mermaid's tears are a form of currency found in the underwater section of Fossil Island. They can be obtained by looting various chests and clams around the eastern part under the water.

Mermaid tears can be exchanged for items in Mairin's Market, such as unidentified fossils, a merfolk trident, bowls of fish, or seaweed spores.

Based on purchasing the Merfolk trident, which costs 1,610,851 coins on the Grand Exchange, each mermaid tear is worth an average of 4,027 coins.

Upon reaching 0% oxygen, a random amount of tears between 10 and 20 will be lost, regardless of how many tears the players have in their inventory at the time.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • One mermaid's tear

  • Two mermaid's tears

  • Three mermaid's tears

  • Four mermaid's tears

  • Five mermaid's tears

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Speaking with Mairin reveals that mermaid tears are actually pearls which is why they don't dissolve in water.

[[File:Mermaid's tear detail.png|left|150px]]
'''Mermaid's tears''' are a form of currency found in the [[underwater]] section of [[Fossil Island]]. They can be obtained by looting various chests and clams around the eastern part under the water.

Mermaid tears can be exchanged for items in [[Mairin's Market]], such as [[unidentified fossils]], a [[merfolk trident]], [[Bowl of fish|bowls of fish]], or [[seaweed spore]]s.

Based on purchasing the [[Merfolk trident]], which costs {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Merfolk trident}}|c}} on the Grand Exchange, each mermaid tear is worth an average of {{NoCoins|{{GEP|Merfolk trident}} / 400 round 0|c}}. 

Upon reaching 0% oxygen, a random amount of tears between 10 and 20 will be lost, regardless of how many tears the players have in their inventory at the time.

==Gallery==
<gallery captionalign="center" widths="120">
Mermaid's tear 1 detail.png|One mermaid's tear
Mermaid's tear 2 detail.png|Two mermaid's tears
Mermaid's tear 3 detail.png|Three mermaid's tears
Mermaid's tear 4 detail.png|Four mermaid's tears
Mermaid's tear detail.png|Five mermaid's tears
</gallery>

==Trivia==
*Speaking with [[Mairin]] reveals that mermaid tears are actually pearls which is why they don't dissolve in water.
